meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ancient Irish alphabet known as Ogham.
meanings.sent1: The ogmic symbols were used by ancient Irish people to write messages.
meanings.sent2: The stone tablet had ogmic inscriptions that puzzled archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The ogmic characters on the tree bark seemed to whisper ancient secrets.
meanings.sent4: Her ogmic necklace was a mysterious link to the past.
meanings.sent5: The ogmic writing carved on the standing stone was weathered but still legible.

meanings.definition: Written in or consisting of Ogham script.
meanings.sent1: The ogmic text on the ancient scroll was carefully preserved.
meanings.sent2: The book contained ogmic passages that only a few could decipher.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly claimed her shopping list was in ogmic script to confuse her sister.
meanings.sent4: His handwriting was so messy, it looked like an ogmic puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The ogmic symbols on the wall seemed to dance in the flickering torchlight.
